description: Detects creation or execution of UserInitMprLogonScript persistence method
author: Tom Ueltschi (@c_APT_ure)
Tim Shelton
name: Logon Scripts (UserInitMprLogonScript)
query: (((process.parent.executable.text:*\\userinit.exe AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:(*\\explorer.exe OR *\\proquota.exe)) OR (process.command_line.text:(*netlogon\*.bat* OR *UsrLogon.cmd* OR *C\:\\WINDOWS\\Explorer.EXE*)) OR (process.executable.text:*\\Citrix\\System32\\icast.exe))))) OR (process.command_line.text:*UserInitMprLogonScript*))
